Tranfornia is 1.000.000.000.000.000.000.000.000 years old! First, it was formed in the Hidden Pangea, Falmornia. in the year 3646466456445744254636449758299505258007446755555 BC! It had 4444 AD Technology in the year 475354445456777777777777777777777777799999999911100000999999999999999899999999999999999999 BC! Now it&#39;s forming PORTAL GUNS AND TELEPORTATION GUNS!!!!!
